result.arabic_text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لَقَدۡ أَبۡلَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّي وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ ءَاسَىٰ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ
result.translation: (Shu’ayb) isaan irraa gara galee nijedhe "yaa ummata kiyya! Ani ergaalee Gooftaa kiyyaa isin dhaqqabsiiseera. Toltuu isiniif dhaameera. Kanaafuu ani ummata kafaran irratti akkamittiin gadda!".
